sentence: Similarly, the idea that was floated by some Center-Left Democrats to put Vice President Harris on the Supreme Court so that Biden could make an Old Guard Republican such as Rep. Liz Cheney (Wyo.)
title: Opinion: The U.S. has four political parties stuffed into a two-party system. That's a big problem.
